From the brand

YOOBLUE JEWELRY

Ankle Bracelets for Women

Maybe, jewelry is just an accessory, but it is by no means superfluous. Jewelry could be a filler of charm, a carrier of thoughts, sweet words of love, and the earnest care of family.

The beautiful starry sky, the majestic mountains, the wide ocean, the free birds and the happy smiles are all our inspirations, and we infuse these spirits into our jewelry designs.

YOOBLUE and your story starts here…

Womens Anklets

Gold Ankle Bracelet

Silver Anklets

initial ankle bracelet

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3.94 x 3.03 x 0.55 inches; 0.63 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 25, 2021
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08ZYV43PS

GIFTS FOR HER: Initial ankle bracelets gift let her know she’s always connected to you just like these Letter Name. Perfect gifts for women, mom, daughter, girlfriend, wife, sister in Birthday, Valentines Day, Mothers Day, Graduation…
SIZE: Adjustable ankle bracelet length 8.5″+2″ extender. Lobster clasp design, you can easily to adjust ankle bracelets length by yourself.
MATERIAL: Initial ankle bracelet made of 14k gold plated, nickle and lead free, tarnish-resistant then can’t be faded in a long time.
AFTER SALES SERVICE: If there are any problems with the layered initial anklets or if you are not completely satisfied, please feel free to contact us first. We will help you within 24 hours, thanks for your support, and we sincerely hope this ankle bracelets could bring you good luck all day.

Ankle Bracelets for Women

Set off on a journey, bring sunshine, bring beautiful mood, bring initial anklet.

LAYERED INITIAL ANKLETS

  • The layered initial anklets consists of one rope chain anklets and one heart initial anklets.
  • You can wear it together or separately as you like.Simply Elegant Beauty!

HIGH QUALITY

  • Sturdy chain with smooth edges, comfortable to wear. Also can use lobster clasp easy to adjust.
  • Hypoallergenic, waterproof, nickle and lead free. Will never fade, rust, or turn skin green.

INITIAL ANKLE BRACELET

  • Customize it with the initial of your loved one to make it a gift to celebrate your unique love.
  • When she wears this she'll have a reminder of her strength and that you are always there for her.

PERFECT GIFTS

  • Minimalist and simple design, fashion trendy anklet, never be out of date.
  • Suit for many occasions, etc party, wedding, ceremony, graduation, dating and vocation.

Initial Anklet for Women

Unique Gifts for Her

The hexagon-shaped ankle bracelet is engraved with A-Z letters. Customize it with the initial of your loved one to make it a gift to celebrate your unique love.

  • Hypo-allergenic, No Tarnish, No Irritation, Comfortable to Wear.
  • 8.5” + 2” Extender, Adjustable Layered Gold Anklet with unique initials.
  • Classic Initial Design, Stylish Delicate Summer Jewelry for Women.

Summer Gifts for Women

Birthday gifts for Women

Friend Sister Gifts

Summer Jewelry

Initial Ankle Bracelets

Double Layered Anklet

FOR HER

FOR FRIENDS

FOR YOURSELF

MATERIAL: S925 Sterling Sliver Post, letter earrings is 14K gold plated and pave with AAA+ cubic zirconia. Our initial stud earrings are nickel and lead free, hypoallergenic,anti-rust.
CLASSIC DESIGN: Simple Heart Initial Design ,sparkle and elegant. Lightweight, comfortable for sensitive ears, initial studs earrings are perfect for every day and night wear.
PERFECT GIFTS: Heart earrings give you a comfortable wearing experience. Special gifts for your lover, girlfriend, wife, fiancee, daughter, female friends or just yourself. Perfect gifts for Mother’s day gifts, Valentines day gifts, birthday gifts..
AFTER SALES SERVICE: Protected by 90-day money back and free exchange if you’re not satisfied with gold initial stud earrings purchased.

Previous page

  1. We always consider product safety to be of the utmost importance

  2. Direct selling by our own factory

  3. Simple designs paired with shiny cubic zirconia make you look less flashy yet regal, easy to match

  4. Thank every customer for their support and trust in Anoup, we will strive to do better

Next page

1 Safe & Hypoallergenic 2 Lower Costs 3 Simple & Cute 4 Good Reviews

Previous page
Next page

  1. Pretty and cute hearts are little girls’ favorites, and we made earrings in their shapes to make the girls who wear them happy and beautiful.
  2. The design of the letters gives the earrings a connection with the girls who wear them, and their relationship becomes closer.

  1. Heart initial earrings for teen girls are tiny but outstanding, perfect for everyday to combine with other earrings or wear it alone.
  2. Heart stud earrings has become a trend that leads fashion.
  3. Heart jewelry is not only attractive but also full of youthful atmosphere.

Earrings for Kids Toddler

Babies and toddlers have very sensitive ears, The post of our earrings are made of S925 sterling silver, free of lead and nickel. Safe to daily wear.

Good Choice for Women & Girls

This stud is suitable for all women to wear, simple design, safe material, lovely shape, beautiful color, it deserves to be loved by all women.

Simple Heart Design

A perfect size tiny heart initial earrings, perfect for girls, kids, toddler, baby girl wear.

Come with A Gift Box

Whether its a birthday, holiday, a special occasion, or just because, heart stud earrings is always the perfect gift.

My little girl’s ears are allergic. Can she wear this stud？

Yes, she can. The post is made of sterling silver, is hypoallergenic and won’t harm her ears.

Are these little girl stud earrings? Can adults wear it?

Of course you can, and it’s even better for you. In order to make it safe for little girls to use, so it’s safe. Simple design with love makes this stud suitable for most people.

I don’t like the backs in the picture. Is there any other choice?

Oh, of course, we will include three different pairs of additional backs in the package, so you can choose whichever pair you like.

I can’t find the letters I was looking for, why?

Our products contain all the letters and are available in three different colors, if some of the letters are not on the list, it is because it is out of stock, we will make up for it as soon as possible, you can come back to Anoup after a while.

From the brand

Shop for yourself

The biggest gap in beauty is when others are hesitant, you use the best choice to overcome time.

About us:

IERICH is a company specializing in sterling silver jewelry, long-term wearing of sterling silver jewelry is good for the body. IEFRICH has been chasing fashion trends, in order to keep you at the forefront of fashion.

The biggest gap in beauty is when others are hesitant, you use the best choice to overcome time.

Love Heart Initial Necklace

Is this product suitable as a gift?

Are our products of high quality?

Our products are strictly controlled and have the highest quality. The color of silver is full and it is better for your body to wear silver jewelry for a long time.
Package: This sterling silver initial necklace is delivered by Amazon fast, with a beautiful gift box, a soft cloth, a thank you card, it is really suitable as a gift for your loved ones.

 ❦The origin of YFN
 A famous jewelry brand with four jewelry chain stores in Hongkong, Shenzhen, Yiwu, Guangzhou. 
 YFN JEWELRY company established in 2006,is mainly engaged in all kinds of gold jewelry,solid 925 sterling silver jewelry,gems and other accessories design,manufacture,retail and wholesale business. 
❦Why choose YFN
 100% high quality, exquisite workmanship. Exclusively sold by YFN only.
 REAL S925- 92.5% Sterling Silver, all products made of silver marked with S925
 Hot, fashion design – latest updates on new designers,hot trends and jewelry news
 Amazing customer service – Please feel free to contact us for any inquiry 
❦How to maintain 

 Keep silver jewelry clean and dry. Silver jewelry should be placed in a sealed dry place when not in use. 
 Best not to wear when taking a bath or swim 
 Regularly wipe the surface with polishing cloth
 ❦Notice: 
 – The product on the illustration may look bigger than the reality. 
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 1.97 x 1.18 x 0.39 inches
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 16, 2015
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ YFN
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B082FWDHY2

Material: 925 sterling silver, allergy free, nickel free, lead free, and cadmium free.
Perfect as Mothers Day, Christmas, Thanksgiving Day, Christamas Day, Valentines Day, Birthday Gifts for Women, Teens, Girls or Moms!
Featured AAA grade quality ,wearing sterling silver prevent allergy,long time wearing keeps you a good health.
100 SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: 30-40 free risk money back to protect you when you receive any fake or defected order, welcome any test of our silver

YFN Brand History: A famous jewelry brand with four jewelry chain stores in Hongkong, Shenzhen, Yiwu, Guangzhou. YFN JEWELRY company established in 2006,is mainly engaged in all kinds of gold jewelry,solid 925 sterling silver jewelry,gems and other accessories design,manufacture,retail and wholesale business. All of our products comply with international quality standards and are greatly appreciated in a variety of different markets throughout the world.We are committed to provide customers with value for money products and attentive sincere service,since its inception has been showed extraordinary brand attributes for its quality,stylish and unique design,superb manufacturing process. All along,YFN insist to exquisite traditional craftsmanship and modern high-tech perfect combination to create the most classic jewelry works. Our Corporate culture:1.Trust and respect for employees. 2.The pursuit of outstanding achievement and contribution. 3.Encourage flexibility and creativity. 4.Adhere to the fine and sincere service.

An elegant script, inspired by handwritten letters. Alphabet charm in sterling silver. Letters A-Z available for you to choose.

Letters A-Z

Letters A-Z available for you to choose.

For all the sisters, all the granddaughters, all the friends who are or who were there by your side, you don’t miss out anyone, just choose their initials to tell them you love them

Read more

Layered Look

Some ladies want to wear more than one letters.

This necklace has no extender chain. Original chain length is 18 inches long.

You can exchange for a shorter chain or just add a chain extender to one of them to creat layered look.

Read more

Special You

You are special you with this necklace.

Letters can be your name initial or any word that tells your special story.

Read more

From Design to Packaging

Original Design

An elegant script, inspired by handwritten letters. Not too formal, not too strange to read. Everything is as nice as she likes.

Delicate Craftsmenship

925 sterling material initial necklaces with AAAAA cubic zirconia, which adds special sparkles to it.

Perfect Gift

Personalized gifts are a perfect way to show someone how much you love and care for them, as such these make a memorable gift for Bride’s Maids, Christmas, Anniversaries, Birthdays and other special occasions.

Read more

Product Description

Beautiful and Dainty Gold Butterfly Necklace. This Minimalist necklace features a small Butterfly pendant that is 14kt gold plated and is perfect to wear by itself or for your gold layering look.

Dainty Butterfly Pendant Initial Necklace

Butterflies have long been regarded as symbols of transformation throughout the world due to their own journey from caterpillar to decorative, vibrant butterfly. Whether you’ve recently gone through your own beautiful transformation or you’ve always just loved butterflies, this minimalist gold butterfly pendant necklace is a stylish addition to your wardrobe.

Cute BUTTERFLY INITIAL necklace for little girls, toddler, or baby. This adorable initial necklace makes the perfect personalized gift for any girl, any age! They will smile with excitement when they unbox their very own cute initial necklace!

Our factory uses top grade materials which ensure every piece of our jewelry is a quality one.Meanwhile,MONOOC Jewelry has the most strictly quality control.We are dfferent from other similar products on Amazon. You will no longer encounter any tarnishing or breakage problems at all, 100% no worry shopping with us!

Perfect gifts for her

For Daughter

High quality 14kt gold plated chain that will not tarnish or discolor with daily wear and will keep its shine for a lifetime.

For Lover

It’s simple, classic design will be popular and trendy for many years to come.

For Friends

This sweet butterfly pendant necklace is the perfect gift for anyone that is opening a new chapter in their life to become their own butterfly.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 5, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ MONOOC
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B089PYMQ68

NECKLACE LENGTH: 16’’ with 2’’ extender, featuring a sturdy lobster clasp. The chain is dainty but strong, and will not break on you.
SUPERIOR QUALITY: Made of high quality 14K real gold plated brass material, non-fading, hypoallergenic, lead-free and nickel-free, does not cause any harm to the human body.
PERFECT GIFT: The dainty butterfly necklace packaged with a beautiful box, exquisite card. It’s a pretty gift for best friends, family, lover, children, sisters nieces or anyone on birthday, Christmas, graduation, wedding or mothers day etc.
After Service: 180 Days Money Back or Exchange Service. If you have any questions with the butterfly pendant necklace, please feel free to contact us, we will make sure to resolve all your concerns with 24 business hours.
